      • saveRecordForRelease

        public Record saveRecordForRelease(org.aspectj.lang.JoinPoint jp,
                                   Release release)
        Deprecated. 
        Method invoked by AOP whenever a Release is saved through ReleaseRepository using the .insert method. This should also catch the ReleaseRepository#save(Iterable) since it internally invokes insert
        Parameters:
        jp -
        release -
        Returns:

      • saveRecordForRelease

        protected Record saveRecordForRelease(Release release)
        Deprecated. 
        This method queries the RecordRepository to find a Record for the given Release.getOcid(). If it finds none, it creates a new record and adds this release to Record.getReleases(). If it finds a record, it just appends this release to Record.getReleases(). This method is intended to be invoked internally by saveRecordForRelease(JoinPoint, Release) which is an AOP hook invoked whenever any Release is inserted anywhere in the application.
        Parameters:
        release -
        Returns:
        the saved Record
        See Also:
        saveRecordForRelease(JoinPoint, Release)
